name: Metaphora: The Moonycat Quest
summary: Metaphora is an one of the kind story driven adventure game that follows the quest of MOONYCAT, last of his kind, to stop an unyielding pandemic which threatens the world. Aided by his star sidekick Lux, the heroes will lift the veil of mystery that floats on the past of his world and the disappearance of the civilisation. LUX will be the key to make the planet blossom again. Find bravery, compassion, and a new sense of adventure in Metaphora.
